name: Blood Bowl III: Season 3
summary: Representing the traditionalist class of necromancy, these teams pick their players from the cream of the beyond, especially a thousand year-old Mummies, whitened Skeletons and starving Ghouls. And yet, they do not scorn a freshly risen Zombie, if he is stolen from the opposing team!
